title: Mimecast - TTP Attachment
description: This dashboard provides information about the TTP Attachments generated on Mimecast Email Security.

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security events by monitoring Mimecast Email Security - TTP Attachment logs with this dashboard. Targeted Threat Protection(TTP) Attachment Protection protects customers from spear phishing attacks that use email attachments. 

This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of attachment-related security threats, enabling administrators to monitor and analyze malicious activity. 

For more information, see the [Mimecast Email Security Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/mimecast).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates TTP Attachment logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security?query=source%3Amimecast%20service%3Attp-attachment-protection%20).

definition.title: Threat Distribution by Action Triggered (For Malicious Attachments)
